2323   // Instantiation
2324   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2325
2326   /**
2327    * Shortcut for calling <c>Class.getDeclaredConstructor().newInstance()</c> on the underlying class.
2328    *
2329    * @return A new instance of the underlying class
2330    * @throws ExecutableException Exception occurred on invoked constructor/method/field.
2331    */
2332   public Object newInstance() throws ExecutableException {
2333      if (c == null)
2334         throw new ExecutableException("Type ''{0}'' cannot be instantiated", getFullName());
2335      try {
2336         return c.getDeclaredConstructor().newInstance();
2337      } catch (InvocationTargetException | NoSuchMethodException | InstantiationException | IllegalAccessException e) {
2338         throw new ExecutableException(e);
2339      }
2340   }
2341
2342   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2343   // Parameter types
2344   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2345
2346   /**
2347    * Finds the real parameter type of this class.
2348    *
2349    * @param index The zero-based index of the parameter to resolve.
2350    * @param pt The parameterized type class containing the parameterized type to resolve (e.g. <c>HashMap</c>).
2351    * @return The resolved real class.
2352    */
2353   @SuppressWarnings("null")
2354   public Class<?> getParameterType(int index, Class<?> pt) {
2355      Utils.assertArgNotNull("pt", pt);
2356
2357      // We need to make up a mapping of type names.
2358      Map<Type,Type> typeMap = new HashMap<>();
2359      Class<?> cc = c;
2360      while (pt != cc.getSuperclass()) {
2361         extractTypes(typeMap, cc);
2362         cc = cc.getSuperclass();
2363         Utils.assertArg(cc != null, "Class ''{0}'' is not a subclass of parameterized type ''{1}''", c.getSimpleName(), pt.getSimpleName());
2364      }
2365
2366      Type gsc = cc.getGenericSuperclass();
2367
2368      Utils.assertArg(gsc instanceof ParameterizedType, "Class ''{0}'' is not a parameterized type", pt.getSimpleName());
2369
2370      ParameterizedType cpt = (ParameterizedType)gsc;
2371      Type[] atArgs = cpt.getActualTypeArguments();
2372      Utils.assertArg(index < atArgs.length, "Invalid type index. index={0}, argsLength={1}", index, atArgs.length);
2373      Type actualType = cpt.getActualTypeArguments()[index];
2374
2375      if (typeMap.containsKey(actualType))
2376         actualType = typeMap.get(actualType);
2377
2378      if (actualType instanceof Class) {
2379         return (Class<?>)actualType;
2380
2381      } else if (actualType instanceof GenericArrayType) {
2382         Type gct = ((GenericArrayType)actualType).getGenericComponentType();
2383         if (gct instanceof ParameterizedType)
2384            return Array.newInstance((Class<?>)((ParameterizedType)gct).getRawType(), 0).getClass();
2385      } else if (actualType instanceof TypeVariable) {
2386         TypeVariable<?> typeVariable = (TypeVariable<?>)actualType;
2387         List<Class<?>> nestedOuterTypes = new LinkedList<>();
2388         for (Class<?> ec = cc.getEnclosingClass(); ec != null; ec = ec.getEnclosingClass()) {
2389            Class<?> outerClass = cc.getClass();
2390            nestedOuterTypes.add(outerClass);
2391            Map<Type,Type> outerTypeMap = new HashMap<>();
2392            extractTypes(outerTypeMap, outerClass);
2393            for (Map.Entry<Type,Type> entry : outerTypeMap.entrySet()) {
2394               Type key = entry.getKey(), value = entry.getValue();
2395               if (key instanceof TypeVariable) {
2396                  TypeVariable<?> keyType = (TypeVariable<?>)key;
2397                  if (keyType.getName().equals(typeVariable.getName()) && isInnerClass(keyType.getGenericDeclaration(), typeVariable.getGenericDeclaration())) {
2398                     if (value instanceof Class)
2399                        return (Class<?>)value;
2400                     typeVariable = (TypeVariable<?>)entry.getValue();
2401                  }
2402               }
2403            }
2404         }
2405      } else if (actualType instanceof ParameterizedType) {
2406         return (Class<?>)((ParameterizedType)actualType).getRawType();
2407      }
2408      throw new IllegalArgumentException("Could not resolve variable '"+actualType.getTypeName()+"' to a type.");
2409   }
2410
2411   private static boolean isInnerClass(GenericDeclaration od, GenericDeclaration id) {
2412      if (od instanceof Class && id instanceof Class) {
2413         Class<?> oc = (Class<?>)od;
2414         Class<?> ic = (Class<?>)id;
2415         while ((ic = ic.getEnclosingClass()) != null)
2416            if (ic == oc)
2417               return true;
2418      }
2419      return false;
2420   }
2421
2422   private static void extractTypes(Map<Type,Type> typeMap, Class<?> c) {
2423      Type gs = c.getGenericSuperclass();
2424      if (gs instanceof ParameterizedType) {
2425         ParameterizedType pt = (ParameterizedType)gs;
2426         Type[] typeParameters = ((Class<?>)pt.getRawType()).getTypeParameters();
2427         Type[] actualTypeArguments = pt.getActualTypeArguments();
2428         for (int i = 0; i < typeParameters.length; i++) {
2429            if (typeMap.containsKey(actualTypeArguments[i]))
2430               actualTypeArguments[i] = typeMap.get(actualTypeArguments[i]);
2431            typeMap.put(typeParameters[i], actualTypeArguments[i]);
2432         }
2433      }
2434   }

2440   /**
2441    * Returns <jk>true</jk> if this object passes the specified predicate test.
2442    *
2443    * @param test The test to perform.
2444    * @return <jk>true</jk> if this object passes the specified predicate test.
2445    */
2446   public boolean matches(Predicate<ClassInfo> test) {
2447      return test(test, this);
2448   }
2449
2450   /**
2451    * Performs an action on this object if the specified predicate test passes.
2452    *
2453    * @param test A test to apply to determine if action should be executed.  Can be <jk>null</jk>.
2454    * @param action An action to perform on this object.
2455    * @return This object.
2456    */
2457   public ClassInfo accept(Predicate<ClassInfo> test, Consumer<ClassInfo> action) {
2458      if (matches(test))
2459         action.accept(this);
2460      return this;
2461   }
2462
2463   @Override
2464   public String toString() {
2465      return t.toString();
2466   }
2467
2468   @Override
2469   public int hashCode() {
2470      return t.hashCode();
2471   }
2472
2473   @Override
2474   public boolean equals(Object o) {
2475      return (o instanceof ClassInfo) && Utils.eq(this, (ClassInfo)o, (x,y)->Utils.eq(x.t, y.t));
2476   }
